title: Hour 1 - Steve Kerr Motivator, US Open Odds
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Steve Kerr Motivator, US Open Odds
description:
Dan says Warriors HC Steve Kerr's comments were taken out of context, and he discusses the odds for the US Open, including Phil Mickelson being a huge longshot. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
